QuestData.Title: Shields Up!
QuestData.Description: The Warsong packleader is trying to raise Telaar's shield. If Kargora does that, the Warsong will have an impervious base.$B$BSo far, they've only managed to initiate the shield. This has the undesirable side effect of protecting the packleader and her shaman at the main crystal.$B$BActivate the crystals on the perimeter of Telaar. That will force the shield to fully deploy.$B$BOnce you do that, Kargora will be exposed.
QuestData.RewardText: Soon de shield gonna cover all of Telaar. Den we all be trapped inside togetha.$B$BDen we go kill de packleader.
